title: React Native RTMP Publisher
description: Hi everyone!  I've improved and re-write my React Native RTMP Publisher package that I shared before!...
body_html:
Hi everyone!

I've improved and re-write my React Native RTMP Publisher package that I shared before!

It is a package that you can broadcast live over RTMP with built-in camera support, bluetooth, wired etc. microphone options and more.

I wrote it with Java & Swift.

Here is the link if you want to take a look. If you like it you can support with 'star' â­ï¸ and share!âœŒğŸ»

If you want to contribute, I'll wait for your PRs ğŸ‘ğŸ»

(PS: I made logo on the readme and I'm amateur, feedback me if you have any advice ğŸ˜)

https://github.com/ezranbayantemur/react-native-rtmp-publisher
body_markdown:
Hi everyone!

I've improved and re-write my React Native RTMP Publisher package that I shared before! 

It is a package that you can broadcast live over RTMP with built-in camera support, bluetooth, wired etc. microphone options and more. 

I wrote it with Java & Swift.

Here is the link if you want to take a look. If you like it you can support with 'star' â­ï¸ and share!âœŒğŸ»

If you want to contribute, I'll wait for your PRs ğŸ‘ğŸ»

(PS: I made logo on the readme and I'm amateur, feedback me if you have any advice ğŸ˜)
